features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Handles user login, registration, and logout for user accounts.

features.name: Super Admin Management
features.description: Provides functionality for super administrators, including product, category, order, shop, and CMS content management.

features.name: Vendor Management
features.description: Provides functionality for vendors, including product, category, and order management.

features.name: Product Catalog & Browsing
features.description: Allows users to view products, browse by category, and search for products.

features.name: Shopping Cart & Checkout
features.description: Manages adding products to a cart, updating quantities, and processing orders through a checkout flow.

features.name: User Profile & Account Management
features.description: Allows authenticated users to manage their profile, view past orders, and potentially manage wishlists and addresses.

features.name: Guest User Functionality
features.description: Provides temporary guest access and allows guest users to browse and potentially make purchases.
